metadata.title: CVE-2023-1095 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In nf_tables_updtable, if nf_tables_table_enable returns an error,nft_trans_destroy is called to free the transaction object.nft_trans_destroy() calls list_del(), but the transaction was never placedon a list -- the list head is all zeroes, this results in a NULL pointerdereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1095` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-239-generic - 4.4.0-239.273
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-239-generic - 4.4.0-239.273
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-239-lowlatency - 4.4.0-239.273
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-197-generic - 4.15.0-197.208~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-197-generic - 4.15.0-197.208~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-197-lowlatency - 4.15.0-197.208~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1118-kvm - 4.4.0-1118.128
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1155-aws - 4.4.0-1155.170
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1143-aws - 4.15.0-1143.155~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1159-azure - 4.15.0-1159.174~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1088-fips - 4.4.0-1088.95
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1088-fips - 4.4.0-1088.95
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-1088-fips - 4.4.0-1088.95
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.4.0-1088-fips - 4.4.0-1088.95
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1138-gcp - 4.15.0-1138.154~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1108-oracle - 4.15.0-1108.119~16.04.1
